author: parithosh
content:
Hoodi genesis files have been merged, they can be found here: 
https://github.com/eth-clients/hoodi/tree/main

Because of the short timelines, we would be running the keys on your behalf at genesis (Monday at 12PM UTC). Once your servers are up, we are happy to transfer the mnemonic/keys and turn off our servers.
(website/infra/etc is still coming online)

genesis validator set can be found here: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/hoodi-validators
it would be great if client teams can work on releases next week including the configs, we'd use that for docs on how to run nodes.

author: parithosh
content: (also it would be nice if client teams can sanity check our configs!)
